name: MLCDropoutLayer
desc: A layer that deactivates neurons randomly to avoid overfitting.

items.name: init(rate: Float, seed: Int)
items.desc: Creates a dropout layer with the probability rate and random number generator seed you specify.

items.name: var rate: Float
items.desc: The dropout rate you use for each element.

items.name: var seed: Int
items.desc: The seed you use to generate random numbers.
